title: Lynda - Fundamentals of Logistics
description:
Lynda - Fundamentals of Logistics

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 44m Appropriate for all Aug 13, 2015 | Uploaded in Oct 5, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Business 
Author: Steven Brown 

Logistics play a critical role in a company's success. In this course, professor Steven Brown explains the role (and importance) of logistics, from factory to customer and supplier to factory. He also covers some key decisions, processes, and strategies: Do you make products or buy them? What kind of transportation do you use? Where are your warehouses? How do you manage inventory? And what information system do you use?â€¨â€¨These lessons will help you understand the importance of logistics and help your company prepare for efficient delivery, distribution, and inventory. Plus, get insights on the latest logistics trends.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Understanding order fulfillment
	â€¢	Defining logistics
	â€¢	Comparing inbound, outbound, and reverse logistics
	â€¢	Key decisions: delivery, distribution, and inventory
	â€¢	Coordinating the supply chain
	â€¢	Trends in logistics management
